directions: Season the beef with salt and pepper.

In a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat, warm the oil until just smoking. Working in batches, brown the beef on all sides, 8 to 10 minutes per batch. Return all the beef to the pot, add the braising sauce and water and bring to a simmer. Cover the pot, transfer to the oven and cook until the meat is fork-tender, 2 1/2 to 3 hours.
Skim the fat off the sauce and serve immediately. Serves 4 to 6.
ingredients: 3 lb. (1.5 kg) beef chuck, cut into 1-inch (2.5-cm) cubes
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
1 jar tomato Turkish pepper braising sauce
title: Turkish Pepper Braise with Beef
